channel.title: In need of a good laugh?
channel.description:
Although LulzSec doesn't really impress me due to the fact that their so called take over's of networks such as Sony were just happened upon through their worm's and not from real hacking I must say that it is quite amusing to read up on their twitter posts. Anyone with some free time or on the road this summer would probably find this a good read.
http://twitter.com/#!/LulzSec
